channel.title: Goat on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in Goat on Stats On the T

item.title: Who Is the Teen GOAT of Men's Tennis?
item.description: When Stefanos Tsitsipas became the youngest player to beat four top 10 players in a single event at the Rogers Cup, many were wondering about the greatest teen performances in tennis history. This post looks at top contenders for ‘Teenage GOAT’ status in the men’s game and how they compare to recent impressive teens.
